text: Ivan Yordanov (Bulgarian: Иван Йорданов; born 7 November 2000) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ludogorets Razgrad. ==Career== Yordanov joined Ludogorets academy in 2017 from Botev 2002. He made his senior debut with the reserves in the Bulgarian Second League on 13 May 2018, playing full 90 minutes in a 4–0 away loss against Montana. On 1 October 2018, Yordanov scored his first goal for Ludogorets II in a 2–2 home draw against Pomorie. In December 2018, he signed a professional contract with the club. Yordanov made his first team debut on 13 July 2019, coming on as a second-half substitute for Dominik Yankov in a 2–0 home league win over Tsarsko Selo. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !colspan="3"|Club performance!!colspan="2"|League!!colspan="2"|Cup!!colspan="2"|Continental!!colspan="2"|Other!!colspan="3"|Total |- !Club!!League!!Season!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- !colspan="3"|Bulgaria!!colspan="2"|League!!colspan="2"|Bulgarian Cup!!colspan="2"|Europe!!colspan="2"|OtherIncludes Bulgarian Supercup matches.!!colspan="2"|Total |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Ludogorets II | rowspan="3"|Second League |2017–18 |2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||2||0 |- |2018–19 |24||2||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||24||2 |- |2019–20 |4||1||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||4||1 |- !colspan=2 | Total !30!!3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!30!!3 |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Ludogorets | rowspan="1"|First League |2019–20 |1||0||1||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan=2 | Total !1!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career statistics !! 31 !! 3 !! 1 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 32 !! 3 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgaria youth international footballers Category:PFC Ludogorets Razgrad players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Association football midfielders Category:People from Plovdiv Province
